title: AEP Agent Application Span
description: Captures properties related to AEP Agent Application.

xdm:userSurface.description: User interface surface where the request originated.

xdm:upstreamClient.description: Upstream client information for observability and feature flag management.

xdm:pageName.description: Human-readable page name from the application.

xdm:pageUrl.description: Full URL of the current page in the application.

xdm:id.description: Data view identifier (commonly used in analytics applications).

xdm:name.description: The name of the dataview in the Adobe system.

xdm:additionalAppContext.description: Additional application context in the Adobe system.
